body: Best woman.  The others are just best girls.

Same here I really don't like Alisa, I always found her annoying, especially when she becomes jealous when Rean is talking to another girl. Sara, Laura and Emma are my favorite girls.
@NullHorizon yeah fies outfit in game 2 is fucking sex appealing lol. I like it a lot. But my favorite is def sara. Alisa doesnt appeal to me either. Laura is my second favorite

@BlindRob: That would be because it doesn't say that. Really, though, pretty much all the Class VII girls (and some from outside of Class VII, too) are the best in my opinion. The only one I don't care so much for is Alisa, and even then, I don't NOT like her, per se, she just doesn't appeal to me as much as the others. Incidentally, did anyone else find Fie's outfit in the second game distracting? It kinda made things hard for me, so to speak...
